column3: “it fucked me up”

“I am liking the Super Skunk.  Overall it is impressive.  I was able to get some massive vape hits using my Pax on the highest setting.  It gives you a nice cerebral head high with a mellow body stone.  Food tastes extra amazing, and sex is extra incredible.  Super Skunk's effects are pretty long lasting.  A feeling of contentment washes over you and the stresses on your mind melt away. Medically it's good at taking a...”

“We got a few bowls worth of this as a sample and it was great. The aroma was quite pungent and smelled of skunk (of course) but with a sort of sweet pine undertone. The taste wasn't overwhelming but had a delicate citrus flavor hidden beneath a clean earthy flavor reminiscent of freshly composted soil. The buds were dense and burned nice and slow, which allowed us to get ample smoke for the small amount of buds that ...”

“Super Skunk is strong!! The high was extremely cerebral and intense, not relaxing at all for me and quite active. This strain comes on fast and is noticably much more potent than the pure indicas i've mainly been smoking recently. If your prone to anxiety or racing thoughts this is a strain I'd avoid, but if you like a powerful THC punch you will love Super Skunk!”

“First time smoking this stuff. I might add, pretty damn good. I got it last night, so when I smoked I already had another kind in me, so I wanted to give it a fresh start, of sorts, and smoke a joint this morning.

Pretty uplifting & intense, yet relaxing, makes you happy. helped me with my nausea I usually get with hep c treatments. smell is pretty unique and intense out of the bag. very skunky, almost piney kind of...”
“fuck i'm stoned as hell man.”

“Best tasting marijuana on earth! I could smoke it for days just to have that taste in my mouth... Anyways, It definitely gives you an attitude adjustment for the better! I was just incredibly happy to be alive and many more positive thoughts. A new favorite.”
“Although it has the strongest smell i ever had its great..i love it...it relaxes you completely and i mean just great”

“Tried this stuff for the first time tonight - I took the first hit off the bowl and my buddy took the second - he coughed hard and as he told me that was a harsh hit I realized I was already starting to get high... Thats amazing for me. Later in the evening we smoked again and he didn't realize it was the same and said wow that tastes nice!" . Loving this stuff! Gets that heady high where you think about something

“Definately one of the best strains i've ever tried.  
The taste and the harshness really fuck it up but I think it's worth it for the hell of a stone you'll get.”

“It was awesome. Every time I open the bag, the whole house starts to reek. Kinda funny to my roommates because they know when I'm about to smoke. lol. This stuff really gives me and my friend the worst (or best) case of the giggles we have ever had. Everything was funny and everything was great. Very nice, hard, thick buds. A lot of tri's that sparkle under the light. A great smoke-it-and-chill-out strain. We got thr...”
“Super skunk was very very good! you could smell it across the room and it took me 1 hit and I was feeling it.”

“Smoked this a while back, perhaps even when I first started smoking. Remember lying on the grass feeling the warmth of the sun course through my entire body. Any form of stress I may have had seemed to vanish almost completely and then when we went for a swim, I felt truly connected with the water.

Great smoke during the summertime if you can go outside and take in nature. The high is calm and the come down is very ...”

“The best strain I've ever had. Helps to relieve stress, lowers the pain level (I suffer from bowel desease) and makes me feel very calm. It brings beautiful state of mind, but often makes me incredibly horny. After two days of using I became unsatisfiable. That could become kinda annoying after few days...”

“awesome although not as pungent as I imagined it would be. but an awesome fruity tangy nose which made me love it even if it wasn't as cheesy as I'd liked. but a nice one for insomniacs but also a mad euphoria verging on a raciness. try some. this is for the sensi seeds superskunk.10/10-El Kevo”
“sweet, smooth,& pain relieving smoke. Easy to grow. When cured the buds hardly shrink,very dense bud.”
“sweet, smooth,& pain relieving smoke. Easy to grow. When cured the buds hardly shrink,very dense bud.”
“Very smooth smoke that tastes like butter, 3-4 hour high that doesn't leave you tired afterwards.”

“Imagine you just went on an exchange year and the university that you are studying in is way below your level, and not really worth your time, but it doesn't really bother you and you just enjoy the copious amounts of free time...... and it's always 420. Yeah, that's Super Skunk.”
“Very flavorful, Vaping through a Bhang Stick  vape Pen.  Very nice high. Helps with my nerve pain nothing seems to dull the pain like this SSK. Also helps with lack of appetite.”

“Super Skunk tastes delicious. It’s everything skunk should taste like. At first my cares are lifted away. I get a little giggly and feel like doing something active but 20 minutes later I’m ready to take a nap. I use cannabis throughout the day. If I were only able to pick one strain it wouldn’t be super skunk because it’s not practical for day time use. This is rainy day or nighttime strain.”

“Solid Indica strain with pleasant taste. At light to moderate doses, provides excellent pain relief and euphoria. At heavier doses, causes this reviewer severe cotton mouth and neurological disturbances. By that I mean it becomes sketchy to hold or carry anything because my entire system experiences these nerve shocks" that have been known to cause me to involuntarily lose my grip on items in my hand or stumble beca...”"
“Pleasant high that made me laugh alot.”

“Relaxes and makes calm. Makes aroused. Makes hungry.
This is towlie smoke. I don't know what I am doing". If you smoke this a lot it makes you dull. Still very good strain overall.”"

“Super Skunk tastes delicious. It’s everything skunk should taste like. At first my cares are lifted away. “This shit smells so fucking pungent it's incredible; definitely adds to that euphoric high. Comes with possibilities of couch lock and hunger kicking in. 

Tested on the beaches of Gran Canaria”

“Super duper bud , grown like a champ this strain put me to sleep in the afternoon like going to bed at night .... Woke up found out that i only slept 1 hour :) super relaxing and nice high would def. grow it again and its an autoflower”

“The skunk smell is almost overwhelming and excellent. This strain is all about a positive feeling of relaxation and happiness. I want to explore mentally, but it's only possible from a relaxed position. Very nice and I strongly recommend.”
“I actually tried White super skunk but that wasn't available on here... this one is amazing... a perfect 50/50 balance between being energetic and uplifted yet still relaxed...”
“Beautiful strain. Solid, psychedelic high with rushes of positive energy. Puts me in a giggly and uplifted mood. Very strong smell!”
“super high me, if you liked skunk you'll love this one; harsh and heavy but worth trying although not for everyday use.Overdo it and you will definitely have a hangover net morning”

“The skunk smell is almost overwhelming and excellent. This strain is all about a positive feeling of relaxation and happiness. I want to explore mentally, but it's only possible from a relaxed position. Very nice and I strongly recommend.”
“THC oil. tastes good. good stuff. in my favorites list for sure”

“When I was younger, I was smoking everything I could for varieties sake and I remember Super Skunk stood out and gave me the greatest high of all.
 In fact I only grow this strain right now. The phenotype I have grows vigorously, and flowers very fast. Mine smells of lemon, skunk and sweet, earthy, cheese. Very dense nugs and perhaps the ultimate, when it comes to post-workout relief as it pushes feelings of mental e...”
“The best strain ever 😭”
“By far this has been my favorite strain from Purple Med.”
“After 8-day tolerance break.  Was super high.”
“The high is intense xD Feels pretty good :) & Hits are smooth, im so high right now xD”

“Had Super White Skunk, a femenized cross of The White And Super Skunk. came in big, semifluffy buds, Orange and red hairs throughout and extremely resin coated. Id say was harvest and cure right on the dot. buds smell harsh in the jar, with a harsh skunk-and-lime smell. Amazing for work and stress related pain and insomnia, Made me want to eat chinese and play my violin”
“Very smelly and makes you want to do stuff makes you kind of talkative And tastes pretty earthy”
“very tasty.  smelled a bit different at first but it sure is good :) only negative is the dry eyes, but as expected.  it looks beautiful.”

“Had Super White Skunk, a femenized cross of The White And Super Skunk. came in big, semifluffy buds, Orange and red hairs throughout and extremely resin coated. Id say was harvest and cure right on the dot. buds smell harsh in the jar, with a harsh skunk-and-lime smell. Amazing for work and stress related pain and insomnia, Made me want to eat chinese and play my violin”
“By far this has been my favorite strain from Purple Med.”

“I’m in love, I’m hybrid or sativa user, till I discover this one. Simply the best for me, relax me while I’m still mentally active and happy. 
 
Amazing!”
“its very tasty as a Concentrate.  unlike other Indicas this one doesn't have that couch lock effect. definitely will be getting this one again.”
“An amazing strain with awesome effects. Very relaxing and can make you very sleepy if you smoke enough. All in all great choice for most situations”

“Melts muscle tension wonderfully, with a nice cerebral kick. It's spacey and trippy with an incredibly relaxing vibe to it that keeps paranoia at bay. The effect is immediate, strong, and long lasting. I only find it once every few years but it's always just as good as i remember.”
“An amazing strain with awesome effects. Very relaxing and can make you very sleepy if you smoke enough. All in all great choice for most situations”
“pretty good head high would recommend it for pain”

“Melts muscle tension wonderfully, with a nice cerebral kick. It's spacey and trippy with an incredibly relaxing vibe to it that keeps paranoia at bay. The effect is immediate, strong, and long lasting. I only find it once every few years but it's always just as good as i remember.”

“Great for watching movies. Gets you kind of mellow and a strong head high with some soothing warm sensations. Sets you into the thinker's mood.”

“I've been smoking many strains lately and I new I had not found what I was looking for when I smoked this Super Skunk 
you get your money's worth from this 
waoooo a whopper off a hi , calm felling through the body and a cloudy head hi ... Latly I've been blasting through 3 spliffs to get to this hi and never get their ..,  
I think this is Super Skunk kush Sorry 
But it's their believe me”

“I have been in search of the perfect" strain to help with chronic pain relief and so far THIS IS IT!  It helps significantly with the neuropathic pain without any of the head mess I have had with other strains.

column1: I am now entering week three of manageable pain and feeling clear headed for the first time in a long time.”"

column3: “I suffer from chronic back and neck pain and migrans. I was looking for a strain that would get rid of my pain without feeling baked. The smoke is really smooth, not much flavor, and relived my pain for about 20 minutes. I'm looking for a strain that will make me feel completely pain free, energetic, uplifted, happy and peaceful...”
“Delicious! Love the smell & taste! Yum!🌿🍯🔥”
“good stuff. I'm fucking high. my mouth so dry, my friend is in da K.O. now. Im gonna puke 110%. good luck”

“Super Skunk makes my head and body feel like I've just slipped into a relaxing bath. I no longer have anxiety, just a slight case of the munchies and euphoria. One of my faves for sure. #420sweepstakes”
“hardly got a high felt tired all the time”
“very nice oldschool strain”

“1987 Super Skunk - The original dank hybrid. An amazing mix of Skunk 1 and Afghan 1 genetics. Loud smell of skunk and tropical trade-winds. This strain was cultivated by the doc. Its a strain we’re proud to offer. Next level quality. Beyond top shelf. Multiple cannabis cup winner.”
“This one hits hard. Definitely a night time strain. Great for sleep and pain relief. Smooth smoke. Not much needed to get results. would definitely smoke again. Just made me a little jumpy.”
“Delicious! Love the smell & taste! Yum!🌿🍯🔥”

“This is a very strong strain. After taking this one you will be a another person, it's certain. It's like a tsunami in yourself. Then you are totally smashed up and you can do nothing for three hours after. Very good for intense sexual activity too. It washes...”

DChroniCD”

“Delicious! Love the smell & taste! Yum!🌿🍯🔥”

“Review Update: On my last review of this strain I told my first impression of the strain. In this ocasion I smoked alone, in my room, and the effects werent that nice. However, today I smoked a joint with 2 friends in the middle of the woods in the afternoon. I think I never laughed so hard in my life. We were easily laughing out loud for 5 straight minutes. Abs aching, crying, and we couldnt even breathe! It was my ...”
“1st time I've had this but I'm an instant fan!  I only smoke indicas and this is the real deal, even as a seasoned, every day smoker, this made my face numb!”
“great flavor easy to grow not overly large but dense sweet tasting nugz. . weird that out off 3 seeds got all the same phenotypes. .nice for breeding stock. . a little unfocused but good buzz”
“I feel like the name says it all for this one. I can't open my jar in the room without making the whole room smell dank. Flavor is similar to the average diesel. High is a couch-locker”
“Good taste and a classic Indica effect.”
“Very nice. Smoked it a few times and always the same really nice head high that lasts the entire ride. It's affects last for at least an hour or two so keep that in mind when you're smoking.”

“Very smelly strain obviously. Gave me a really mellowing head high, great for just chilling with some friends watching a game or something. Not really a daytime herb, for me at least, cannabis effects everyone differently.”

Another classic that's still going strong.. The smell is...skunky and funky. Not the greatest taste IMO but earthy and grassy. Works great for both medicinal and recreational use. “Love this strain. Gets to work everytime. Love the powerful skunky taste and the smell of the smoke that lingers after a nice joint or bong, definitely skunks out the house easily. Nothing bad to say, it's definitely up there in my favs. Wish I could get a seed.”

“Classic Old School strain Super Skunk was picked up @ SWELL Farmacy  AZ.SWELL has a great cut!

Reaked of Skunk LOUD SMOKE sweet tasty.Last for  about 2 plus.Which will keep you medicated on set helped with Chronic Pain @ PTSD great anxiety relief.Very pungent great muscle  relief n body pains.”

“1987 Super Skunk - The original dank hybrid. An amazing mix of Skunk 1 and Afghan 1 genetics. Loud smell of skunk and tropical trade-winds. This strain was cultivated by the doc. Its a strain we’re proud to offer. Next level quality. Beyond top shelf. Multiple cannabis cup winner.”

“This is called Super Skunk for a reason!!
Another classic that's still going strong.. The smell is...skunky and funky. Not the greatest taste IMO but earthy and grassy. Works great for both medicinal and recreational use. Great painreliever and it gets you real wasted too;) Best suited for evenings If you're gonna smoke heavily because it will put even a  seasoned stoner to sleep. Mainly for Indicalovers. .”
“Good taste and a classic Indica effect.”
“I got this Super Skunk at Botanico and it is amazing. Such a powerful body high! It is great for those who are sore, but still want to exercise. The live resin tests at 82.7%. It's amazing high.”

“Really powerful stone, but with a touch of paranoia. Smoked too much of this and had a rough trip. In moderation, this strain will knock your socks off, making everything funny and giving crazy dry mouth. One of the first strains I ever smoked. Munchies always follow suit. A couch locking strain in my opinion.”

“Had some Super Cheddar" which was Super Skunk x Cheddar cheese but had been backcrossed to have a greater genetic identity of the Super Skunk. Some seriously pokey weed. Proper dense nugs with that pungent skunk smell and slight sweetness of the cheese with a beautiful taste. The high was awesome
column4: very relaxing with a great body high. The euphoria of the cheese slowly kicks in afterwards creating a great sense of bl...”"

column3: “Just like the original skunk (possibly my all time favorite weed) but with a solid couch lock indica bent to the high. I keep this one in the medicine cabinet.”
“I got this Super Skunk at Botanico and it is amazing. Such a powerful body high! It is great for those who are sore, but still want to exercise. The live resin tests at 82.7%. It's amazing high.”

“I enjoy smoking SS. The flavor is so unique and the feeling is excellent. Good for sleeping, but not too powerful to make you go crazy. I like the strain and will recommend if you are just starting to consume cannabis.”
“Amazing strain, quite the lasting high, lasted for aprox. 4 hours and did one joint”
“This shit fucked my shit up. didn't leave me couch locked at all for some reason. was proper nice out of a pipe and resulted in a rather good day. I recommend this.”
“very good !!! taste this shit😊🙋”
“love it....the Cannibal lovers dream...smell taste....stone...become at one”
“OMG I <3 this strain. I found myself on cloud 9. I love it, my new favorite!”

“Most flower that is extremely Euphoric can be a bit much for me;  However Super Skunk was a very smooth onset, and powerful punch.  It causes a great uplifting high, with a lot of spacing off and some silence, then BAM bursting with creativity and a positive attitude.  Although it does make me extremely tired after the head buzz comes down, so only smoke if you're planning on staying in.
Do not hesitate to try if it'...”
“Good stuff”
“Very nice one and strong as well be careful!”

“I just got an enail, domeless titanium nail, and a recycler. I set the rig to 710F after seasoning it.

This Super Skunk wax is really intense. I miss this feeling. It's like being high for the first time. The taste of the wax is also great.

Not much else to say because I can't remember what I was typing.”
“A little dab will do you, but plan on doing nothing . Really helped relax me! And don't forget some munchies! Lol”
“Super relaxin shiiiit. Music and food are very appreciated”
“definitely my favorite💯💯💯 I need a plug I'm n ATL”
“Great for melting into your surroundings when it’s time to unwind. Works good for any insomnia issues I have, I would recommend this strain for when you want that couch lock.”
“Was nice had alright effects harsh on throat when in a blunt”
“Super heavy hitting indica strain. Prepare to be glued to your bed after a couple of hits!”
“first skunk strain and i can't complain 😁🤣😄💪💪”

“Super Skunk. Cartoons are amazing. Video Games are hard when you forget what you're doing any given moment. Pretty buds, glorious smell, and an very very mellow high. 

Brad Neely Harg Nallin Sclopio Peepio folks. Google that.”

“I liked it for nerve pain when I smoked it and was fortunate to find a seed in the eighth I purchased, so I grew a plant out in my backyard. I finished it off with compact florescent lights in the basement. A very tall plant with a nice dense cola abundantly frosted with trichomes. Very stinky buds.
I got 4 ounces from it and the finished product was even better than the original. This is a must have for nerve pain f...”
“A warm mellow high that you can really just sink into”

“A pleasant but not overly memorable strain. I had it mostly at a music festival and it kept my back pain at bay and I was alert, active, happy, and laughing a lot. Usually if I am active I don't get the munchies and that was the case here as well. Not bad cotton mouth was a huge plus.”

“I only smoked half of a bunt of my outdoorplants khief and it totally Made ne feel relaxed,I felt the Music in my whole body and just thoght about so many things it didnt make mehr totally lazy but after like two houers or three I was so Tired I just fell asleep in my opinion perfekt for relexing”

“High as giraffe nuts. Plain and simple. 
The density of the bud is what sold me. The smoke is what made me want more. Pain immediately gone and I slept like a baby.”
“It’s probably the best indica i tried 🤙🏼🤙🏼🤙🏼”
“Picked me right up & took away my pains 💯🔥💥”
“I’ve only smoked this as a wax but it is fucking amazing. I have migraines and it helps with pain. It tastes like straight oranges and is extra sweet on the exhale.”

“Super Skunk by Sensi Seeds is a mid-90s European classic. Back in the day every coffeeshop was full of White Widow and Suoer Skunk, and some are still until this day, for a reason. It has a potent indica high that will give you the typical staggered optics a heavy strain can give you. Don't think about driving or having a proper conversation when this kicks in. Make your way to the fridge or supermarket as you'll be ...”

“Another oldschool classic. I have smoked this strain a lot back in the days. Sweet skunky spicey smell and taste. You can smell this strain from a mile away, it´s so loud. It makes you sleepy so be sure not to smoke it at daytime.”
“Loved this strain I‎t just might be my favorite.... all my pains were gone”

“this trend was very unique in the sense that it reminded me of old school skunk. I had a happy and uplifting feeling along with the pain relief it gave me, making it a good strain to come home to after a hard day's work. just let the old school memories and the wonderful feeling it gives you melt your worries away!!! SuperGreenOGkush keep your eyes out in New Mexico for Super Green Medical Marijuana Dispensary.”

“This s--t had me 50 shades of stupid. The smell was wild, my whole house stunk up just from a few grams sitting out in my room. Normally I'm a smoke 'til my face falls off" kind of smoke but 2 big hits off a bubbler had me good for a few hours”"

“Personally I'm not a big fan of Super Skunk. However it tastes not bad, the effect isn't really heavy and it just makes you lazy and you won't be able to finish something you wanted. Before going to sleep this is a good strain, but I wouldn't recommend it smoking it before you go to a party or something like that.”
“Great for melting into your surroundings when it’s time to unwind. Works good for any insomnia issues I have, I would recommend this strain for when you want that couch lock.”
“Hands down a very good high!!”
“It‘s a good deal. It really slows you down but you stay funny. That‘s 5/5. But on the other hand you get a really dry mouth when eating old cheeses after smoking it. I mean really dry.”

“Not bad. I’ve grown two of these (indoors). They weren’t too tall, but boy did they smell. Fed them nothing but water and seaweed extract. In 3 months they were harvested, and cured for like a month or so. The smoke is nice (I haven’t tried a lot of strains though), moderate couch-lock, relaxing as hell, very light paranoia on the first few minutes. Effects last 2 hours or so. Sleep comes really easy with this one, a...”
“Very relaxing and euphoric. The taste is sweet and everything is just great.”

“It was my first strain I have ever tried. I tried it 2 years ago. Shit was loud as fuck and helped with Crohn's disease and made me feel relaxed and my muscles were relaxed. I had a very dry mouth giggles were okay but not bad. Would recommend though.”
“This strain helped me eat. Another hit and I'll be in bed for the night. Great strain, May or may not help PTSD Flash backs.”
“Damn good indica, Super Skunk is powerful and intense, and also has medical benefits which is super awesome, but if you're really vulnerable I think you should avoid this strain. I really liked it!”
“An excellent strain for after a long day (or night) at work. perfect for treating aches and melting away stress”

“I love how this strain smells and tastes. It would be amazing in a vape. One of the smoothest smokes I’ve ever had.

The high is relaxing but not sedating. It puts me in the perfect mood for reading or working on something creative. Very nice body buzz. It’s been particularly helpful for winding down in the evening.”

“Full five stars for me. 

I tried this for the first time last night after picking up a couple of grams a while ago. This was after I smoked some RBK & was having a bad time, so I’m particularly impressed with its positive effect on me. 

For context, I typically use Vortex & Grapefruit as a rather persistent part of my medicating routine to manage PTSD & depression. Super Skunk did both AND brought me out of a spira...”
“Super Sleep and paranoid hunger.”
“Really nice strain, it got me 5 minutes trying to remember what I wanted to google, and it was info about this strain itself lol”

“A pleasant but not overly memorable strain. I had it mostly at a music festival and it kept my back pain at bay and I was alert, active, happy, and laughing a lot. Usually if I am active I don't get the munchies and that was the case here as well. Not bad cotton mouth was a huge plus.”
“definitely my favorite💯💯💯 I need a plug I'm n ATL”
“Super relaxin shiiiit. Music and food are very appreciated”

“I just got an enail, domeless titanium nail, and a recycler. I set the rig to 710F after seasoning it.

This Super Skunk wax is really intense. I miss this feeling. It's like being high for the first time. The taste of the wax is also great.

Not much else to say because I can't remember what I was typing.”
“Good stuff”

“Really left me fucked. I can’t get up from my chair and i’m drolling while talking to my friend. Has a very calming effect, I feel at peace and not worried. Has given me cotton mouth, but a cold beverage has solved the issue. I would recommend smoking it at night, since it’s has an intense relaxation effect.”

“I used to smoke a lot of indicas strain and like it because of the relaxation and stuff. But this one, It gets me way to high in a bad way... I can’t feel the relaxation and the body high that Indicas usually provide.”
“great smoke super hard dense buds dark green”

“Super Skunk is really nice. Certain skunk buds are not for me.....but this one was awesome. Very nice. Listed here as indica the strain that I sampled was a hybrid but leaned toward the indica side for sure, but little couch lock". Taste was nice and smoke expanded perfectly in my lungs for a nice
“works great for me also has a good flavor”
“Perfect strain to fill a bowl with after you get off work.”
“Just had 3 joints and I was happy AF!!”
“Nice potent effect.  Pretty much a standard indica from my experiences.  Smells pleasant and tasted nice in a pipe(better than the bong oddly enough).”
“Wasn't the best skunk ive had, i expected a little larger high then i had. If going somewhere but dont want anyone to know your high, this in a small dose would be perfect.”

“The name says it all. What a great smelling bud. It has a  strong citrus/fuel aroma similar to Sour Diesel. I smoked it out of a bong and the taste was mild in compare-sent to the smell. The high was kind of a creeper. About 5 minutes after smoking it, I realized that I was REALLY stoned. It's a great stress relieving strain. It's perfect after a hard day at work, when I still need to push on. The effect is very happ...”
“I found this at Green Apothecary La Grande Oregon”
“Smooth hitter. Harshness isn't really there with this strain which is nice. Smells absolutely pungent. Very relaxed high. Recommended for headaches and for stomach aches.”
“I've had this multiple times since I have been smoking and it never fails to impress me every time.”
“Great high that keeps you dazed and locked. Doesn't make you sleepy and I smoke this as more of a day-time strain. A lot of people consider it a favorite but I think it's okay.”

“Usually a very fine, stony indica; but the specific curing process the grower used took away from the usually wonderful terpene content of this plant. I'm assuming they were impatient and quick-cured on some racks under light. Super Skunk is usually a very pungent strain, and fantastic for Indica and Sativa Lovers alike. Usually has a rubbery, skunky, citrus smell. However, this does seem to help my back.”
“It is great but is available in Alamosa Co and its surrounding areas. FYI your site said it was not.”
“extremely beautiful high”

“Grate strain, bit harsh on the way out tho.
Very nice taste too, 8/10”
“Great for pain”

“It's a nice sweet taste. Good indica couch lock. More intense than Mr. nice in hybrid category, its potency is intense. Sativa effects are sort of limited but a notch or two better than nice, well worth it. Mr. Nice is mellower though, but skunk gives you less paranoid feeling. Good if you want to be numb and creative. Munches  are noticeable.”
“Amazing!”
“Very relaxing. Smoked via my Roor bong with my friend and we both liked it.”

“I only smoked half of a bunt of my outdoorplants khief and it totally Made ne feel relaxed,I felt the Music in my whole body and just thoght about so many things it didnt make mehr totally lazy but after like two houers or three I was so Tired I just fell asleep in my opinion perfekt for relexing”
“A warm mellow high that you can really just sink into”

I got 4 ounces from it and the finished product was even better than the original. This is a must have for nerve pain f...”

“Super Skunk. Cartoons are amazing. Video Games are hard when you forget what you're doing any given moment. Pretty buds, glorious smell, and an very very mellow high.

“first skunk strain and i can't complain 😁🤣😄💪💪”
“A little dab will do you, but plan on doing nothing . Really helped relax me! And don't forget some munchies! Lol”
“Very nice one and strong as well be careful!”

“Most flower that is extremely Euphoric can be a bit much for me;  However Super Skunk was a very smooth onset, and powerful punch.  It causes a great uplifting high, with a lot of spacing off and some silence, then BAM bursting with creativity and a positive attitude.  Although it does make me extremely tired after the head buzz comes down, so only smoke if you're planning on staying in.
Do not hesitate to try if it'...”
“OMG I <3 this strain. I found myself on cloud 9. I love it, my new favorite!”
“love it....the Cannibal lovers dream...smell taste....stone...become at one”
“very good !!! taste this shit😊🙋”
“This shit fucked my shit up. didn't leave me couch locked at all for some reason. was proper nice out of a pipe and resulted in a rather good day. I recommend this.”
“Amazing strain, quite the lasting high, lasted for aprox. 4 hours and did one joint”

“I enjoy smoking SS. The flavor is so unique and the feeling is excellent. Good for sleeping, but not too powerful to make you go crazy. I like the strain and will recommend if you are just starting to consume cannabis.”
“F?ckin super stinky .. nothing like some skunk to get the mind right .never have I ever smoked on this strain .the first time should always  be the best the best one HAPPY SMOKING”
“it makes a nice high”
“definitely not the best variety of skunk I've had but still enjoyable. the smell is killer, you know it once it hits your nose.”
“I dunno if you can call slurring my speech spastic but its close enough. I got told this strain helped me talk normal so I should stick with it.”
“great feeling takes away all the pain and relaxation its awesome”
“Super skunk is a perfect name for this bud. I think it smokes best in a pipe. A couple of hits and you're good. Its become one of my favourite buds.”
“Fantastic night time strain.”

“This is my old school bud i smoked for years, it was always good bud. Its a very skunky indica. Good head high along with smooth body buzz perfect for pain relief. Definitely a before dinner/ after work bud but I wouldn't say nighttime weed.”
“really relaxing, leaves you in a pure contemplative state.”
“great high for chilling in bed on a rainy day an watching movies. its a nice smooth indica, i didnt knock me out and it made me fuckin happy.”
“nice easy smoke, an every dayer. Not going to blow u away with terpine content but a good crowd pleaser.”

“First hit and definitely became a favorite though I couldn't imagine working on this strain.  Though my work is sitting down and thinking.  I did get a lot of work down around the house. Stayed motivated and finished more in one day than I have in weeks!  Very strong lift up high. I have a high tolerance and it got me going right away. I love skunks and would be great for house work, garage, yard with some great tune...”
“some tingling, pretty chill high, smoked 2 bowls and it hit pretty good.”
“I'm smoking a concentrated version on this strain and it is great! I prefer an indica over a sativa and this is always a great choice! Smells and tastes great :)”

“Sensi Seeds create a unique Indica, with light frosty dense nugs. Super Skunk's genetics, Skunk #1 with back-crossing the legendary Skunk with Afghani genetics, created a strain known to be extremely pungent, fresh with a mild to med smoke, finishing in a surprisingly sweet taste. 
Great for Stress, Pain, Loss of Appetite, Insomnia.
4/5”
“Very mellow, easy on the lungs and great for my chronic pain!!!”
“Top strain, old school stuff”

“Skunky smelling verified but with hints of sweetness and earthy. The smoke was sweet tasting and sweet smelling in the air, hits you intense right at first puff instantly. 

Got mine at Sticky Buds on Broadway in Englewood.”

“I picked up some super skunk live resin and the taste it incredible. That reviewer that said his whole neighborhood smelled it was not joking. It smells and tastes so skunky sweet and delicious but strong!”
“Super stuff. Knocked me off my feet”
“this weed got me soo high after taking 3 bong rips, i wuz tripping out to the gauges on my car.”
“Great Strain. I think this weed has some kick to it and a great feeling to just go out for the day.”
“Had a dab of this before science class, it was really relaxing and I felt like I was the fucking king of the world”
“Uber vibrant flowers. Bright green with bright orange hairs. Has a nice sweet citrus undertone and smokes fairly smooth. Nice light uplifting sensation makes this the perfect daytime strain.”
“One of the greatest strains I've ever sold/smoked along with Master Kush 😍😍 Totally recommend this for someone who needs to get rid of pain !”
“Super stinky dense buds well rounded smoke with relaxing all round feeling.Smells like a corpse”

“-German-
Also ich mag ja  Indicas eh nicht so krass. Die Wirkung ist relativ stark und die Pflanze hat sehr viel Pollum.
In geringen Dosen würde ich es wenn überhaupt vorm Schlafengehen verwenden. 
Für Indica-Liebhaber  ist die Pflanze praktisch eine gute Wahl!

- macht sehr müde
- am Morgen geraucht und der Tag ist gelaufen
- am Abend geraucht und der Morgen, wenn man früh aufstehen muss gestaltet sich als sehr schw...”
“Great body high while also very relaxing and soothing on the mind, great for stress and anxiety. Really enjoying the high !”

“This totally saved my New Years, or ruined it, depending on how you look at it. Super smooth, and it kicks in gradually, and then it keeps kicking in until it kicks you into a couch or bed, and that's where you'll probably stay. Unless you consume it at a playground designed like a pirate ship, and then it'll release your inner child. 
3/5 Pirates.”

“Quickly becoming one of my favorite strains. Usually vape other sativas, have always liked diesel and mid-grades, but I find that two puffs is all that is needed to alleviate stress, depression, pain and nausea making just a gram for me last two weeks (I'm not a heavy user though). Since I use cannabis for IBS and pain and nausea associated with it as well as depression and indicas are generally too sedating, this wo...”

“Great strain for the night. It knocked me on my ass. 
Great strain and slept great!”

“2nd strain I ever smoked. Awesome feeling and gets you high with a little amount. Pretty loud smelling stuff (hint the name). Overall great strain and would love to try it again some day 
.”
“First time with this strain an I must say, I thoroughly enjoy it. Its smooth pull and earthy taste are very plesant for a relaxed smoke sesh.”
“Delicious strain. Not something you can smoke and clean the house with. My wife has been on couch lock since she started this bowl. She deserves it though, she's a hard working lady.”

“I tried this when I was young and inexperienced. Stuff was so potent you could smell it from a good ten feet away... Even though it was triple wrapped and zipped in my coat pocket. Smoked it at an anime convention. Best convention experience ever. I was normally very nervous in large crowds when I was younger. One bowl of this, and had an amazing time just cruising the halls. Came down some time later. Called my frie...”
“Relaxed Happy feeling”

“This is a top shelf indica next to master kush. Super potent as to the 'Super' name. The flavor is like most indicas, earthy and dank. Mostly it's known for in strength, and I can see why. Had is next to a 'strong' chocolate chunk and was still much better. The high is very couch and muchie heavy, so beware. This is not for novice users. Otherwise insomniacs and indica enthusiasts rejoice in this skunk.”

“Personally i didn't like the particular cut of super skunk i tried.The high took a long time to set in and when it did it wasn't anything special.The smell was the standard skunk smell pretty intense.”

“I acquired this strain in a hash oil Vape cartridge from Craft Elixers. It was a deep, dark color, with a deep dark flavor to accompany it. Lemon, hash, skunk, and the traditional dry herb vapor taste were the profiles, nothing I was used to or acquired a favorite taste to, but I took it. The high was mostly body, but I could feel my eyelids getting heavy. It relaxes my muscles and my body screamed for sleep. My frie...”
“I got a super skunk rosin from cannazone and it was the most flavorful rosin I've ever had. 100% tastes like a pina colada!”
“Nice and mellow.”
“Strong indica, tastes great, smells great. Heavy on the eyes”
“Super skunk has strong smells and a nice mellow high. Didn't feel like a heavy indica though, definitely euphoric and cerebral while relaxing mind and body.”
“Makes me pass tf out.”
“Just started seeds. All of them popped. Very good genetics. Growing strong n fast.”

“I was growing Super Skunk outdoors in 2016. I had 3 beautiful plants and all did very well. No bigger problems. The yield was average.

After curing them for a month, they were ready to smoke. The smoke was A+. And the effect was amazing”
“Growing the strain now, would love to know how many weeks flowering is going to take”

“Strain I have is called Appalachian Super Skunk" guessing it's same as super skunk but I like it got a gram to try at compassion center and it broke out to a very very big L. But love the fruity taste and this one gives you the get shit done high lol”"

“Went for a coffee shop tour for a few days in Amsterdam and out of all the bud we had this was definitely one of our favourites. Really strong, great smell & taste, high lasts for really long. Pretty strong couchlock, quite euphoric, a great strain to chill and watch movies/TV to.”
“Saw the new Harold and Kumar on my second go of this potent strain.  It allowed me to enjoy the movie very much i highly recommend this strain if you see this movie.”

“Migraine pain 7; nausea 7-8 when I medicated round 1900 or so. Takes bout 5-10 to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (an absolute must for me). Body high allowed me to eat a medium sized dinner & relax after my day ended kinda weird. Head high took me away which was exactly what I needed. I dint notice that dis strain made me either energetic nor sleepy. Must've had more of a 50/50 hybrid or somethi...”
“Still can't complain. Was told tonight i dont slur my words when Im on it.”
“Definitely a body high. Smooth and good to socialise on”
“Delicious taste and distinct smell I loved this beauty. Anxiety relief”
“Really good effect, good high, good taste - good Skunk!”
“Very nice”

“Oil vaped this last night and got lifted quickly. A very calming buzz with my head still able to function. The body high made me fidgety but I was able to manage. Best part...no paranoia. I was totally able to chill and enjoy my night. This has found a place in the rotation.”
“not what i expected”

“Really enjoying this at the moment. Buds are heavy and dense with a heavy skunky sweet smell. Lots of crystals. Taste is wonderful, heavy skunk with sweet and earthy tones. Nice indica effects, very relaxing and happy, extreme munchies. Some couch lock but not too bad. Didn't really help for my muscle pain in ways other indicas do (especially King Kong), but still a great strain that I'm sure indica lovers will enjoy...”
“packs a wollop”

“Stongest Indica ever!!! if you wanna get your inner freak out this is the strain for you! Lets get down and freaky and freaky and down!!! JUST Be ready to face your kalahari drey eye desert moments!!!”

“Classic skunk young or old Skunk is a winner grandfather strain.I recently picked up Funk Skunk in Salem Or.***Warning will stink up your hotel room with heater on***Pungent skunk earthy smell and flavors love this shiptz.Can't ever get sick of skunk like OG you can't put her down keeper for sure put a ring on it or in this case buy a lot! Buds were tight and flavor of pungent skunk berries and earthy kush.High with ...”

“If you've ever smoked a good pheno of Afgan kush, the high is very similar yet slightly headier than the Afghan. Good density, great flavor, semi-exceptional smell before smoked, exceptional smell after smoked, that's really when the skunk comes out, when you smoke it.. Overall, excellent bud for any occasion.”
“Good for Beginners. good buzz, easy to grow good yield”
“Holy shit... destroyed me.”
“The way it smells is the way it tastes. I liked the high it gave me. The smoke is nice, pretty smooth. I recommended it :)”
“Mine really wasnt that stinky, but tasted great. Smooth smoking, cheap for me at $5/g. Beyond worth it at that price.”
“not What I expected.... 😞😞”
“everything!”

“Very mellow Indica for me. I vaped this strain in oil form and it was lab tested at 59.76% THC and 1.92% CBD. The mellow nature may be due to increased CBD content but I will need more comparisons. Anyone have an opinion? Very tasty, mine was infused with Watermelon terpenes for flavor and the relaxing, body-lock and appetite effects are felt immediately. 5/5 on this strain in E-juice form; what more can you ask for ...”

“Classic indica Afghani meets mid-80's skunk genetics; personally I think the Afghani is particularly dominant when I run into Super Skunk.  The buds are a mix of greens with lots of orange hair and plump/round like you'd expect from Afghani genetics.  I don't particularly find it to be super strong (skunky) smelling, but it has a subtle classic cannabis flavor with a prominent hashy-sweetness that is very much a char...”
“It's a bird
column5: it's SUPER SKUNK to the rescue !!!" This strain is an Indica lovers dream !!! She lovingly offers a wonderful sedation paired with a great uplifted energy radiating right from the chi. The buds are picturesque and pungent
column6: covered in red hairs and resin crystals. It lasted for hours and  really sent my blues packing ! A must try for those who love to get stoned!!”"

column3: “awesome stress reliever and great for pain too ! i'm smoking on some shatter from it.”
“10/10 very nice taste and look”
“Normal relaxing hit. Normal skunky sweet flavour. Perfect medicine for stress and bad days. Smoke it when you are nervous and everything will be better. 3.5”
“It hits you in the face with its pungent smell, and then hits you in the face and eyes with the high. Very relaxing.”
“Gave me an instant headache, intense paranoia and as it says on the description, dry mouth.”
“Love the smell. 1 J to the face and I feel great.”
“good strain fi di morning like cheesy flavor fi di sativa pheno”
“Had this in the Bulldog coffee shop in Amsterdam!! Good stuff”
“Happy high , nice taste also”

“Top shelf is a good indica heavy strain, nothing too special. Great for new patients Im sure,  to natural medicine vets it might not be enough for real pain. Good smoke draw and buds are pretty dense. Chromed out, gentle.”
“it's a real good fun body high”
“Gooooooooooood sh!t.”
“nice in my crafty vape totally chills me out, i love having this with a coffee such beautiful feeling”

“Great for relieving pain without clouding your head. Helps mildly with anxiety, relaxes muscles, increases appetite. Good to mix with a heavy indica before bed.”

“10/10 would smoke again. I've had plenty of earthy herb, Super Skunk has a really nice taste, the most dominant one in my opinion being its earthiness rather than being skunky. “Awesome, as a fan of indicas myself this would be a go to for a good nights sleep! Has a little bit of a sativa background but the more you smoke the more your bound to get some shut eye!”
“Stanly danky”

“Makes me feel relaxed and sleepy.”
“Real nice strain, gets you stoned for quite a while, but gives you a real dry mouth.”
“A great strain but be warned this will smell real dank when you smoke it! I sit on my back porch and everyone in my neighborhood noticed the smell.”

“Makes me cough like mad. It's ok but it like smoking Haze. I'm a blue cheese fan.”
“quality strain of marijuana. take precautions with the smell because the name ain't no lie”

“This stuff is pretty good, smoking it with my friends is super great, we all act the same and everyone is fun to be around. After the first couple of hits is when everything kicks in, and towards the end of the high is when you get really tired and a dry mouth.”
“amazing high,,,,perfect for relaxing”

“Super Skunk is a unique growing and smelling plant, ive only cultivated it outdoor.  The plants had massive semi-hard colas about arm size, I topped each one 3 times to create a total of 14 colas/per plant all loli - pop style.  The one thing I did NOT like about the genetics were some fluffy bud phenos I got from Nirvana's seed pack.  While some plants were awesome others were a waste of a season.  Proper Super Skun...”
“The buds I got were pretty good. 8.5/10 overall. Good high, very relaxing indica. Each time I've gotten it, I ended up satisfied.”

“I am very impressed with the effects of this girl!! Super tasty and super Indica,  Very hash like on inhale with some  tasty skunk and earth mixed in, and very skunk on exhale. Was a privilege to smoke and not to Indica like in the effect. I did get really relaxed, but not drowsy. Very nice relaxing anxiety killer and heavily recommended.”
“Una buena raza, te aturde casi al instante, además tiene un rico sabor y el subidón es bastante relajante y gracioso.”

“Super Skunk has a  great aroma and look to it. The smoke is smooth with a very earthy flavor profile. The high comes on slow and is mild to good. Gave me a serious case of the munchies though hahaha. Overall good strain.”
“Great strain. Heavy High. One-two hits and I'm medicated. Great strain for pain and stress.”

“Pungent skunk scent straight out of the package with surprisingly sweet taste. Made my whole body tingle. Gave me hella dry-mouth though, so stay hydrated. Hope to see this back at AZ Organix soon. :)”
“one of my favrourites”
“powerful smell and it tastes pretty good. mellow, relaxing high. not the heaviest indica I've ever smoked but u will get a good sleep.”
“Great smell and taste, this bud is a relatively light indica that will induce a calm, yet powerful high.”
“Not much”
“With it's super diesel and pine smell, it's flavor and aroma act quickly to bring you a euphoric high. Some may find the pine and diesel taste overwhelming, but the end effect is nostalgic.”
